texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over Christmas and New Year, most of the TfL network is open. However, there are some changes and planned works that may affect your journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
See our Status updates map for 1 January 2019 for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Tube"}
We will run a reduced service on all lines:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["For travel before 04:30 today, check our \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/new-year-s-eve-2018\"\u003eNew Year's Eve page\u003c/a\u003e ","There will be no District line service between Earl's Court and Kensington (Olympia)","There will be no Piccadilly service between Rayners Lane and Uxbridge until 11:00","On most lines, trains will run about every 3-10 minutes in central London and about every 10-30 minutes in outer areas and on branches after 04:30","Trains will run less frequently or start later on some sections of the Central, Hammersmith \u0026 City, Metropolitan, Piccadilly and Waterloo \u0026 City lines. \u003ca href=\"/plan-a-journey/index\"\u003eCheck your journey\u003c/a\u003e for details","Last trains will be at weekday times"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["On routes without closures we are running a Saturday service","First trains will be at Sunday times","No service between South Tottenham and Barking","No service between Romford and Upminster","No service between Edmonton Green and Cheshun","No service between Surrey Quays and Clapham Junction","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Chingford (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Hackney Downs and Clapton)","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Edmonton Green / Enfield Town (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Cambridge Heath, London Fields and Hackney Downs)","Use replacement or local buses - check \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2019-01-01T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2019-01-01T23%3a59%3a59#line-raillo-overground\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @LDNOverground for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL Rail"}
There are changes to services today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Liverpool Street and Romford","Reduced service between Romford and Shenfield (trains run about every 15 minutes)","Use replacement or local buses - check \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2019-01-01T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2019-01-01T23%3a59%3a59#\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLRail for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"DLR"}
A Saturday service is running from 08:00.
Follow @LondonDLR for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Trams"}
A Sunday service is running today.
Follow @TramsLondon for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}

A Sunday service is running today. Due to road closures for the New Year's Day Parade, some buses in central London will be diverted or stopped short of their final destination until about 18:00. Please check your travel.
See all today's planned bus changes on our Bus status updates map for Tuesday 1 January 2019 .
Follow @TfLBusAlerts for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Driving"}
There will be road closures in central London for the New Year's Day Parade. Roads will reopen from 18:00, or as soon as possible.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The following roads will not be reopened following New Year's Eve fireworks event: Piccadilly, Whitehall, Lower Regent Street, Haymarket, Waterloo Place, Cockspur Street, Trafalgar Square, Whitehall, Strand Westbound and Shaftesbury Avenue Westbound, Parliament Square, Bridge Street, Millbank and Victoria Street.","The \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/congestion-charge\"\u003eCongestion Charge\u003c/a\u003e and T-Charge do not apply today","See our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2019-01-01T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2019-01-01\"\u003etraffic status updates map for 1 January 2019\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLTrafficNews on Twitter.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Emirates Air Line"}
Today the cable car is running 08:00-19:00.
See Status updates for Emirates Air Line on 1 January 2019 or follow @EmiratesAirLine on Twitter .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Taxis \u0026 minicabs"}

For taxis (black cabs) there is an extra charge of £4 if you're travelling today or until 06:00 on Wednesday 2 January. For private hire (including minicabs), there may be an extra charge, please check when you book.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Rail"}
Check National Rail's Christmas page for information about service changes and planned works over the festive season.

links.title: August Bank Holiday & Notting Hill Carnival
Improvements between Acton and Wood Lane
